subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Italy qualified for the European Championship and took France along with it by defeating Scotland, 2-1, on an injury-time goal by Christian Panucci. Spain, Croatia, Poland and the Netherlands also advanced to next year’s tournament. Israel’s 2-1 victory over Russia improved the chances of England to qualify.
